scripts.contracts:test: npm exec --workspace contracts npm run test
scripts.contracts:compile: npm exec --workspace contracts npm run compile
scripts.contracts:deploy:mumbai:verifier: npm exec --workspace contracts npm run deploy:mumbai:verifier
scripts.contracts:verify:mumbai:verifier: npm exec --workspace contracts npm run verify:mumbai:verifier
scripts.clean: npm exec --workspaces -- npx rimraf node_modules && npx rimraf node_modules
